author: m.kalinin
content:
One another thing I forgot to mention on that topic is comparison between `justified` in PoS and `k-confirmations` in PoW. It is required either 384 seconds network delay or 2/3 dishonest for `justified` to be reorged (or anything in between of combination of these two). In PoW it is 13 seconds and 1/2 dishonest respectively.

`justified` comes with much weaker assumptions than `k-confirmation` rule in PoW
